messages.subject: Re: Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/14/03 12:07:58 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/14/03 12:07:58 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< Well, I'm not Sandra, but someone else asked me about that tape, and
here's
how you can get it:

This is a tape of a talk Sandra Dodd and Richard Prystowski gave at a
homeschooling conference in California last year. I picked the tape up at
the Live and Learn Unschoolers Conference last October in South Carolina,
and I can't get over what a wonderful tape it is. Here's the link to order
the tape. It's $6 plus S&H.
>>
I just ordered one from Sandra myself, contact her to see if she has anymore.
~Kim

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, If you go to www.usps.com. you can get the price shipping will be. I believe shipping will be more than $1.00. Janis ... From: SandraDodd@aol.com To:
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,
If you go to www.usps.com.
you can get the price shipping will be.

I believe shipping will be more than $1.00.

Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: SandraDodd@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 14, 2003 1:31 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Peaceful Parenting



In a message dated 4/14/03 10:07:14 AM, marji@... writes:

<< Here's the link to order
the tape. It's $6 plus S&H.
>>

They're selling them for $6?
I've said $7.

Okay, you can get them cheaper from there. <g>
Sorry.

I've been selling them $6 in person but hadn't been selling by mail, so I
threw on a dollar for the box and postage.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: ... how to respond! I didn t state my question very clearly, but it s ok because I figured it out.  I was just wondering if the websites that I got when I
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, SandraDodd@a... wrote:
>> Sources of what? That was an interesting queston and I don't know
how to respond!>>

I didn't state my question very clearly, but it's ok because I
figured it out. I was just wondering if the websites that I got when
I goggled "peaceful parenting" were good information. Sorry for the
confusion.

I'll be sending for your tape. Thank you.
Jill

Sandra Dodd, . , ,

Yikes!


OOOps.

Sorry. I think it breaks some rles for me to have told people that.

Sorry, list-owners-and-operators. It wasn't intentional advertising.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/14/03 8:30:43 AM, jk_lenzmeier@yahoo.com writes:  Sources
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/14/03 8:30:43 AM, jk_lenzmeier@... writes:

<< Also, are the websites that come up when I used

Google reliable sources? >>

Sources of what? That was an interesting queston and I don't know how to
respond!

I have Peaceful Parenting tapes here but you can also buy them from HSC's
website. I'm asking $7 with shipping and $6 in person (South Carolina, or
wherever I might be).

My address is
Sandra Dodd
2905 Tahiti Ct. NE
Albuquerque NM 87112

I have a paypal account under just
SandraDodd@...

or you could send a check, either way.

If the google search turned up that tape for sale through HSC, it should
still be good, as they come from the guy who makes the copies.

The tape is not just me, it's a 'duet' between me and Richard Prystowski, a
homeschooling dad in California. We're very different and we've done four
presentations together over the years, and I really like them.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I m not Sandra, but someone else asked me about that tape, and here s how you can get it: This is a tape of a talk Sandra Dodd and Richard Prystowski
messages.messageBody:
Well, I'm not Sandra, but someone else asked me about that tape, and here's
how you can get it:

This is a tape of a talk Sandra Dodd and Richard Prystowski gave at a
homeschooling conference in California last year. I picked the tape up at
the Live and Learn Unschoolers Conference last October in South Carolina,
and I can't get over what a wonderful tape it is. Here's the link to order
the tape. It's $6 plus S&H.

http://conference.hsc.org/tapes2002.html

I hope that helps!

Marji

At 14:26 4/14/03 +0000, you wrote:
>Sandra do you have a tape available on Peaceful Parenting? I thought
>that I read it somewhere here that you did. If this is available, how
>can I get one? Also, are the websites that come up when I used
>Google reliable sources? Thank you.
>Jill

messages.subject: Peaceful Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra do you have a tape available on Peaceful Parenting?  I thought that I read it somewhere here that you did. If this is available, how can I get one?
messages.messageBody:
Sandra do you have a tape available on Peaceful Parenting? I thought
that I read it somewhere here that you did. If this is available, how
can I get one? Also, are the websites that come up when I used
Google reliable sources? Thank you.
Jill
